sentences.en: a small village twenty miles from Nairobi
sentences.cn: 距内罗毕20英里的一个小村庄

sentences.en: Brian McClair nodded in his twenty-third goal of the season.
sentences.cn: 布赖恩·麦克莱尔头球攻入了自己本赛季第23粒进球。

sentences.en: By the time he's twenty he'll know everyone worth knowing in Washington.
sentences.cn: 到20岁时，他就会认识华盛顿所有值得认识的人。

sentences.en: Elections will now take place on November the twenty-fifth.
He was stricken at twenty-one with a crippling malady.
I've managed to narrow the list down to twenty-three.
sentences.cn: 我已设法把清单上的项目压缩到了23项。

sentences.en: It had taken Masters about twenty hours to reach the house.
sentences.cn: 马斯特斯用了约20个钟头才到达那所房子。

sentences.en: Photographs of the crime scene began to arrive within twenty minutes.
sentences.cn: 不到20分钟，犯罪现场的照片就开始传来了。

sentences.en: Police say they have arrested twenty people following the disturbances.
sentences.cn: 警方说骚乱发生后他们已逮捕了20人。

sentences.en: She was sentenced to twenty years' imprisonment for poisoning and attempted murder.
sentences.cn: 她因投毒和谋杀未遂被判20年监禁。

sentences.en: Southbound traffic tailed back for twenty miles on the M5 near Bristol.
sentences.cn: 在布里斯托尔附近的5号高速公路上，南行的车辆排成了绵延20英里的长龙。

sentences.en: Take a hundred and twenty values and calculate the mean.
The agent spied for East Germany for more than twenty years.
sentences.cn: 该特工人员为东德做了20多年的间谍。

sentences.en: The King had brought his own bodyguard of twenty armed men.
sentences.cn: 国王带了20名持枪的贴身侍卫。

sentences.en: Twenty eight percent of the federal budget is spent on defense.
Up to twenty thousand students paid between five and six thousand dollars.
